sentences.sContent: Awarded to Manuel Barbeito at the Industrial Health and Safety Office in Maryland for scientific studies that found microbes cling to beards, making more hirsute men a potential laboratory hazard.
sentences.sContent_eng: Awarded to Manuel Barbeito at the Industrial Health and Safety Office in Maryland for scientific studies that found microbes cling to beards, making more hirsute men a potential laboratory hazard.
sentences.sCn: 该奖项授予来自马里兰州工业卫生安全办公室的曼纽尔·巴尔贝托，他发现胡须上的微生物使多毛男人成为实验室的潜在危险。

sentences.sContent: Instead of the peaceful hirsute ornamentof the past he is now marring his face with a lot of bristles.
sentences.sContent_eng: Instead of the peaceful hirsute ornamentof the past he is now marring his face with a lot of bristles.
sentences.sCn: 替代他过去平和的多毛的胡子，大量的粗短毛被他用来损伤自己的脸。

words.tran: 多毛症（尤指妇女多毛症）

trans.tranOther: having a lot of hair on your body and face
